unnormalised: Bora, mhunnlear tum Mumbai-nt bori property listing-am zoddche vixim vichartaat, haina? Baraabor, poilem Magicbricks, 99acres, aani Housing.com sarkhya site-am sodhun poyaat. Tanchea kodden sodanch flat-am, apartment-am, aani ghoraamuy vikrek vo bhaddeak astaat, "2 BHK", "3 BHK" vo "1 RK" sarkhea vivraanchea vangdda. Tumi "Flat no. 101, Sai Apartment, Linking Road, Bandra (W), Mumbai - 400050" sarkhe address-ui dekhtele, mhunnlear tumkaa tthauk asta kithem kitekhui konnchya zagear asa tem.
normalised: ठीक आसा, म्हणटकी तुमी मुंबयत बरी मालमत्तेची नोंदणी सोदता, बरोबर? बरें, पयलीं Magicbricks, ninety nine acres, आनी Housing dot com सारक्यो साईट तपास करात. तांचे कडेन चड करून फ्लॅट, अपार्टमेंट आनी घरांची विक्री आनी भाड्या खातीर नोंदणी आसता, जातूंत "two B H K", "three B H K", वा "one R K" अश्या तपशीलांचो उल्लेख आसता. तुमी "Flat number one hundred and one, Sai Apartment, Linking Road, Bandra west, Mumbai - four hundred thousand and fifty" असो पत्तो लेगीत पळयतले, देखून तें थिगणी खंय आसा तें तुमकां बरोबर कळटलें.
text: Bora, mhunnlear tum Mumbai-nt bori property listing-am zoddche vixim vichartaat, haina? Baraabor, poilem Magicbricks, 99acres, aani Housing.com sarkhya site-am sodhun poyaat. Tanchea kodden sodanch flat-am, apartment-am, aani ghoraamuy vikrek vo bhaddeak astaat, "2 BHK", "3 BHK" vo "1 RK" sarkhea vivraanchea vangdda. Tumi "Flat no. 101, Sai Apartment, Linking Road, Bandra (W), Mumbai - 400050" sarkhe address-ui dekhtele, mhunnlear tumkaa tthauk asta kithem kitekhui konnchya zagear asa tem.

unnormalised: Ani ek gozal yaad thevchi ti mhollear zago. Andheri (E) vo Borivali (W) sarkhya zageank Bandra vo Juhu peksha komi kharch lagunk yeta. Punn tumkam yete-vocheak lagpi vell gunnakar korcho podtta, khas korun tum Nariman Point sarkhya zagear kam kortat zalear. Station vo bus stop kitli laggi asa hacher loksh dium. Google Maps tumcho ixtt! Tem paimni cholun vochunchea vellyachoi andaz dakhaita (zoxem "station-ak 10 minttan cholun vochonk zata").
normalised: Ani ek gozal yaad thevchi ti mhanllear zago. Andheri purv vo Borivali pošchim sarkim zage Bandra vo Juhu peksha unne kharche astaile, punn tumak vell, khas korun tumi Nariman Point sarkhya zagear kam korit zalear, dišṭṭi divpak zai. Station vo bus stop kitlench lagim asa hacher dišṭṭ divat. Google Maps tumcho iśṭ! Tem cholpacheantar kitle mintta lagtat tem dakoita (udaronak “stationak dha minttanchim cholne”).
text: Ani ek gozal yaad thevchi ti mhollear zago. Andheri (E) vo Borivali (W) sarkhya zageank Bandra vo Juhu peksha komi kharch lagunk yeta. Punn tumkam yete-vocheak lagpi vell gunnakar korcho podtta, khas korun tum Nariman Point sarkhya zagear kam kortat zalear. Station vo bus stop kitli laggi asa hacher loksh dium. Google Maps tumcho ixtt! Tem paimni cholun vochunchea vellyachoi andaz dakhaita (zoxem "station-ak 10 minttan cholun vochonk zata").

unnormalised: Nimanyak, fokot online-chea yadiancheruch adharunk ravonakat. Thollavea brokers-amk uloi – tanchea kodden chodd korun online yerunk naslili yadi asta. Tech porim, chitrant kitlem-i borem distori punn vostu polleunk voch. Udokacho dab, liftichi dekhbhal, ani suraksha sarkheo vostu tankaun polle. Ani vata-ghati kori, bhai! Dakhoil'li kim'mat (zoxem, "Rs. 1.5 Cr mukhar") chodd korun komi korunk zata, khas korun tum rokddim dit zalear. Tumchem sopnantlem ghor sodunk tumkam borem disum!
normalised: Ani nimannek, fokot online listingancheruch visvas thev naka. Thollave brokeranche kodden uloi – tanche kodden chodd korun online yet naslele listings astat. Tech bhaxen, kitlem-i borem distori fotuancher, property khuponnacher ghevn vachunk zai. Udkache pressure, lift maintenance, ani security sarkhea vostunchem nireekhonn kor. Ani bargain kor, bhai! Dhakoyl'li kim'mat (jeysen, "ek point panch koti rupiya pasun fuddem") chodd korun kami korunk zata, khas korun tum rokddi dilaar. Tuka tujem sopnanchem ghor mellonk subhechha!
text: Nimanyak, fokot online-chea yadiancheruch adharunk ravonakat. Thollavea brokers-amk uloi – tanchea kodden chodd korun online yerunk naslili yadi asta. Tech porim, chitrant kitlem-i borem distori punn vostu polleunk voch. Udokacho dab, liftichi dekhbhal, ani suraksha sarkheo vostu tankaun polle. Ani vata-ghati kori, bhai! Dakhoil'li kim'mat (zoxem, "Rs. 1.5 Cr mukhar") chodd korun komi korunk zata, khas korun tum rokddim dit zalear. Tumchem sopnantlem ghor sodunk tumkam borem disum!
